version_description:
- Location verification was activated in Withdrawal with QR Code
- Bill payment menu developed

- Location verification was activated in Withdrawal with QR Code
- Bill payment menu developed

We continue to develop Vakif Katilim mobile app and add new features for you. With new release you can:

- Make E-İhale (E-Bid) payments
- Pay bills and give bill orders from your credit card
- Make tax payments
- Update acoounts added to your card

We continue to develop Vakif Katilim mobile app and add new features for you. With new release you can :

- Find the list of following capabilities in Investment Transaction menu,
· Stock Transaction
· Fund Transaction
· Sukuk Buy/Sell
· View Portfolio
· Investment Account Statement
· Money Transfer to Investment Account

- View your debit cards and update your card details
